channel.title: Could use a little bit of client help would be much appreciated
channel.description:
Hey guys, alright so I'm using the Z.epstity Client & source & I'm having a bit of trouble I already did the whole cache C: drive get up & all my source runs & so do my compilers but when i run the client i just get the whole "Press any button to continue" I cant figure it out because my compilers & my source connect to my JDK just fine can anyone solve this for me I'm pretty sure it gone right over my head but I've been doing this for like 3 hours :p heres my client [code]@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
[/code]

item.title: Could use a little bit of client help would be much appreciated
item.dc:creator: @aaronchris aaronchris
item.description:
@aaronchris wrote:

My bad I didn’t realize there was a client help section I;m a little new & so for the “Java ‘client’” I need to change client to the class? do you you think you can tell me what Ineed to add? I dont like being spoonfed nor do I ask for it but I had to come get help cause I just coudnt get it x]

Read full topic
item.source: Could use a little bit of client help would be much appreciated

item.title: Could use a little bit of client help would be much appreciated
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You’re posting in the wrong section.

@echo off
title Run
java client
pause

That will allow you to run the client. Change the “client” to the class that you use to run the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Could use a little bit of client help would be much appreciated

item.title: Could use a little bit of client help would be much appreciated

item.description:
@aaronchris wrote:

Hey guys, alright so I’m using the Z.epstity Client & source & I’m having a bit of trouble I already did the whole cache C: drive get up & all my source runs & so do my compilers but when i run the client i just get the whole “Press any button to continue” I cant figure it out because my compilers & my source connect to my JDK just fine can anyone solve this for me I’m pretty sure it gone right over my head but I’ve been doing this for like 3 hours heres my client [code]@echo off
title Client
cd bin

pause

[/code]
